page.title: 18POLICE
page.content: The local police station to this area is in Linton (6 miles away) which covers an area of 13 Parishes using 7 constables (1 is a WPC) and a station Sargeant and only 3 vehicles. Policing levels are therefore low, with just 1 man covering the whole of the West Wickham, West Wratting, Weston Colville and Carlton area. There is a trend now for more friendly policing, where the Parish Councils can influence local decisions. Methods are controlled regionally and numbers employed are regulated nationally, though the personnel are always changing. Crime levels are low in this rural area (driving offences by residents but out of this area are probably the most common).
